articles.title: Messi to leave Barca; City make Grealish EPL’s most expensive player, eye Kane - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: It’s been a busy day in the European transfer market with the news two of the continent’s most in-demand stars will leave their boyhood clubs ahead of the new season.
articles.content: FC Barcelona wholeheartedly expresses its gratitude to the player for his contribution to the aggrandisement of the club and wishes him all the very best for the future in his personal and profession… [+3171 chars]
